TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CTFontDescriptor extends System.Object implements class ObjCRuntime.INativeObject, class System.IDisposable
type CTFontDescriptor = class interface INativeObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Font Descriptors contain a description of font features that can identify a font.

remarks.para: Font Descriptors contain a description of font features and can completely identify a font. Sometimes the description is not complete enough, and the system will pick a font that matches the specified parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class CoreText.CTFontDescriptorAttributes attributes) cil managed

Docs.param: Font attributes to use for the font descriptor.
Docs.summary: Creates a font descriptor from a set of attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.nfloat size) cil managed

Docs.param: PostScript name for the font to create.
The desired size. If the size is zero, the font is treated as if the size had not been specified.
Docs.summary: Creates a font descriptor from a PostScript name (and optional size).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Releases the resources used by the CTFontDescriptor object.

remarks.para: The Dispose method releases the resources used by the CTFontDescriptor class.

Calling the Dispose method when the application is finished using the CTFontDescriptor ensures that all external resources used by this managed object are released as soon as possible. Once developers have invoked the Dispose method, the object is no longer useful and developers should no longer make any calls to it. For more information on releasing resources see ``Cleaning up Unmananaged Resources'' at https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/498928w2.aspx

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.para: If set to , the method is invoked directly and will dispose manage and unmanaged resources; If set to the method is being called by the garbage collector finalizer and should only release unmanaged resources.

Docs.summary: Releases the resources used by the CTFontDescriptor object.

remarks.para: This Dispose method releases the resources used by the CTFontDescriptor class.

This method is called by both the Dispose() method and the object finalizer (Finalize). When invoked by the Dispose method, the parameter disposing is set to and any managed object references that this object holds are also disposed or released; when invoked by the object finalizer, on the finalizer thread the value is set to .

Calling the Dispose method when the application is finished using the CTFontDescriptor ensures that all external resources used by this managed object are released as soon as possible. Once developers have invoked the Dispose method, the object is no longer useful and developers should no longer make any calls to it.

For more information on how to override this method and on the Dispose/IDisposable pattern, read the ``Implementing a Dispose Method'' document at https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/fs2xkftw.aspx

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Finalizer for the CTFontDescriptor object
